item.title: WireGuard mesh
item.description: This is part of my series on renovating my homelabs to ring in the roaring ‘20s. In this post I'm going to set up WireGuard, an exciting new in-kernel VPN technology from Jason Donenfield. It will be landing in the core Linux kernel very soon (probably in 5.6)! Setting up a VPN will let me access devices at any of my sites without having to expose all of those devices directly to the internet.
